body.name: Good Molecules Lightweight Daily Moisturizer - Facial Lotion with Macadamia Oil and Shea Butter and Antioxidants - Anti-aging Skincare for Face
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 50 mins
features: SMOOTH, NOURISH, AND MOISTURIZE: Give your skin a boost with this Lightweight Daily Moisturizer from Good Molecules. This potent blend is rich in antioxidants and fatty acids to nourish and hydrate your skin for a smooth, healthy glow.

EASY TO LAYER, LIGHTWEIGHT HYDRATION: This non-greasy moisturizer is ultra-light weight, soothing, and smoothing making it an ideal daily moisturizer for layering with sunscreen or make-up to provide your skin with hydration and nourishment all day long.

POTENT INGREDIENTS FOR HEALTHY SKIN: Plant-based alternative to silicone helps smooth skin texture and plump up fine lines. Macadamia seed oil moisturizes and nourishes the skin, while antioxidant-rich shea butter helps to soothe and hydrate.

PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR BEAUTY REGIMEN: Apply a pea-sized amount to clean skin. Let absorb for a few moments before applying sunscreen or makeup. This moisturizer is suitable for daily use and layers well due to its lightweight finish and non-greasy formula.

GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: This facial moisturizer is powerful enough to bring results and gentle enough for all skin types. Our formula is silicone-free, fragrance-free alcohol-free, mineral oil-free, peg-free, vegan, and was never tested on animals
body.description: Lightweight Daily Moisturizer by Good Molecules100ml/3.4ozThe Good Molecules Lightweight Daily Moisturizer smooths, hydrates, and preps your skin. Formulated with macadamia seed oil, shea butter, and a naturally derived silicone alternative, this lightweight daily moisturizer works to nourish and helps create a smooth, plumped-up canvas for flawless makeup application and a hydrated, natural glow.See A Difference In Your SkinNatural, nutrient-packed oils provide lasting moisture and nourishment for your skin. Macadamia seed oil is rich in omega 6 and also contains squalene and oleic acid to soften the skin and provide deep hydration. Shea butter helps soothe the skin and encourages healing with antioxidant vitamin E for a healthy looking, balanced tone. Our formula also contains a plant-based, naturally derived alternative to silicone which helps smooth skin texture and plump up fine lines all with a lightweight, breathable feel.Easy Addition To Your Beauty RegimenThis non-clogging facial moisturizer absorbs quickly without a heavy or greasy texture. It is a wonderful daily moisturizer and leaves skin smooth and supple. The lightweight finish layers well under makeup, leaving skin soft and hydrated. It can be used daily in the morning or at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and scent free
reviews.reviewText: Very nice for the price…good texture and absorption…no scent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Heavens, This Is A Great Face Cream
reviews.reviewText: It sounds nuts, but I find most moisturizers don't moisturize. They are either too light or just sit on top of the skin. It doesn't claim to be antiwrinkle, but hydrated, elastic skin looks younger and radiant. You get a lot of product for 12 bucks, and be generous with the amount you use. Finding a quality fragrance free, clean ingredient face cream has not been easy, even at a higher price point. It doesn't pill and is not waxy. It is neither runny nor thick; more like a body lotion consistency. I am so happy I gave this a chance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and easy on my skin
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin. This does not irritate me at all. Haven’t had a breakout since using it 5 months ago! It is a pretty light formula, so if you are looking for a thicker cream, this isn’t for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is what it says it is
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight moisturizer, no scent (little sad about that), and rated well on Yuka app. Great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this myself, and am so happy! I was worried that the shea butter would trigger a breakout but my skin is very happy with this product! Being acne prone, sensitive, and fighting signs of aging, finding a moisturizer that's right for me is nothing short of a nightmare. My daughter has even started to use it and loves it too. It takes a little bit of work to get it rubbed in to my skin in some areas. I don't wear a lot of makeup, so I can't speak much to the priming benefits of it, but as a moisturizer it does it's job wonderfully and most importantly DOESN'T BREAK ME OUT! I also use a lot of actives and rotate retinol in and out, so my skin can get super dry and flaky. I was having issues with dry spots in my morning routine because of this, so I was really looking for a moisturizer that would combat that. So acne prone, sensitive skin friends - rejoice because this just may be your new holy grail! Also, the price point is so, so reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this every day - it's a great moisturizer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I haven't been using this product for very long, but my skin is clearer than usual and feels so soft. Couldn't live without it!

reviews.reviewerName: Great to use for fake nails and a up light!!
